description: fol. 1b-10a. 222 x 168; 155 x 65 mm. 21 lin. 1131 H. Divided into muqaddimah, 15 faṣl, and khātimah; the same treatise also in the mss. Berlin 5810, Brit. Mus. Suppl. 765/3, and Paris 2542/3 (all three anon.). Incip.: ... الحمد لله حمدا ىلىق بجلاله ... وبعد فهذه رسالة مختصرة اذکر فىها اسماء الرسوم
author: Ibn al-Shāṭir, ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm, 1304-1375
title: Risālah fī asmāʼ al-rusūm al-marsūmah ʻalá al-ālah al-musammāt bi-al-asṭurlāb al-shamālī dhāt al-ṣafāʼiḥ.
creator: Ibn al-Shāṭir, ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm, 1304-1375
subject: Astrolabes—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
